post.body:
Whoa, these days have been incredibly busy for us! We're working tirelessly with our amazing team to meet tight deadlines. Our current challenges are mainly aerial, as we're playing around a lot with helicopters.

Matching real shots with CG and creating huge FX and simulation scenes has been quite the adventure. We're thrilled about the progress we're making and can't wait to share the final results of The West Sky with you!
